0x00359141 = 0000 0000 0011 0101 1001 0001 0100 0001
           = 1.101011001000101000001 * 2^21

So M = 1.101011001000101000001 => f = 0.101011001000101000001
and E = 21 => e = 148 = 10010100.

So the 32-bit floating point representation is
0 10010100 10101100100010100000100.

  01001010010101100100010100000100
           *********************
00000000001101011001000101000001
